IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall only allow authorized personnel to perform configuration and deployment.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall log and notify authorized users of errors during account management.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable authorized users to manage user account permissions.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall establish a migration capability that provides the ability to migrate or upgrade systems and applications.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall implement data backup procedures to ensure that authoritative data is securely backed up prior to executing the migration or upgrade.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall maintain auditable logs of all migration or upgrade activities, documenting changes made, reasons for changes, and responsible personnel.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall perform post-migration validation to ensure that all systems and applications are functioning as expected and that no data loss has occurred.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide pre-validation to evaluate how the migration or upgrade will affect existing systems, applications, and data integrity.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify and document stakeholders involved in the migration or upgrade process.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem's authorized only personnel shall manage configurations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall adhere to configuration management best practices and standards.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall notify users of failed configuration updates or conflicts.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall track and manage configuration changes across integrated tools and environments.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall ensure security policies are followed regarding configuration access.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide user-friendly interface for viewing and managing configurations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall collect feedback from developers and users regarding their experiences with new configurations, summarizing findings for review.

IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable configuration and deployment of integrated digital environments that support NGIDE tool solutions.

IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall log deployment errors.

IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide an interface for environment setup.

IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall ensure secure access to configuration settings and deployment processes.

IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide the summary status of deployment.

IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall comply with organizational security policies.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable authorized user access to data management features.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall comply with data retention policies and regulations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support the ability to implement data management in accordance with the governing master disaster recovery plan.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall log and report failed data operations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable users to manage data lifecycle processes, including storage, retrieval, and archiving.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall protect sensitive data in compliance with security policies and regulations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide a user interface for data management.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall protect user data in accordance with governing data protection regulations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall allow only authorized personnel to perform the destruction process.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall follow data destruction best practices to comply with regulations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide documented guidance to authorized users for the IDE destruction process.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall log and notify authorized users of status and issues encountered during the destruction process.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide the ability to  completely remove the integrated digital environment leaving the system in a stable state.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support multi-user dashboard collaboration features.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide configurable dashboard templates to accommodate various user needs and metrics.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall integrate with data streams to ensure data availability.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide documentation resources to assist users in configuring and interpreting dashboards.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support dashboard displays of key performance indicators for decision-making processes.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall maintain historical data logs.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support customizable alerts and notifications.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support updates to dashboards.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide user authentication and authorization mechanisms to secure access to dashboard configurations and data.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable dashboard user interaction to perform detailed analysis.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable the ability to manage data within the digital engineering ecosystem throughout the product lifecycle.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable the ability to store data within the digital engineering ecosystem throughout the product lifecycle.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support the Digital Thread Management Solution capabilities.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable the ability to integrate digital engineering applications throughout the product lifecycle.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support the ability to map product lifecycle activities to the digital engineering ecosystem.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall support the ability to track performance metrics across the product lifecycle.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide capabilities to support hosting non-IDE applications.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide Planning and Collaboration Capabilities.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide System Engineering Factory Capabilities.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide Software Factory  Capabilities.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable only authorized users to access logs.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall ensure logging practices comply with governing policy and regulations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem  shall provide configurable dashboard to support logging and monitoring.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall generate alerts for critical logging failures.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable log aggregation to comply with governing guidance for performance.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall centralize logs from integrated tools for performance and security monitoring.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall ensure logs are protected against unauthorized access and tampering.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall generate alerts for security events.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable authorized user access to operational state information.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall generate alerts on operational events.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall secure operational state data.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable dashboards showing the operational status of systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide a user interface for managing user accounts.
The digital ecosystem shall enable only authorized users access to MFA configuration settings.
The digital ecosystem shall implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) mechanisms for applications when granting access from the Internet or other untrusted network.
The digital ecosystem shall support multiple MFA methods, including SMS verification codes, email links, authentication apps, and biometric verification.
The digital ecosystem shall enable only authorized users access to authentication protocol configuration.
The  digital ecosystem shall enable configuration of applications to utilize approved authentication protocols, including SAML, WS-Fed, OAuth, and OIDC.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall ensure compliance with maintenance and operational state defintions.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable monitoring and management of the system and tools during the operational state.

IDE Capability: Configure and deploy Integrated Digital Environment
Requirement Text: The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall comply with organizational IT governance.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall conduct performance optimizations to be performed by authorized users only.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall comply with internal performance standards and benchmarks.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide alerts for performance degradation beyond defined thresholds.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall provide tools for monitoring and optimizing the performance of the digital ecosystem components.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall implement security measures to protect sensitive performance data.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem users shall have access to a dashboard displaying optimization suggestions.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall make work instructions  available to authorized personnel.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall implement role-based access controls.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enable user account changes to reflect across all integrated systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall allow authorized users to manage user accounts within the digital ecosystem.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall limit access for processes acting on behalf of authorized users.
The integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall  perform vulnerability scans in applications  containing CUI weekly
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall review, approve or disapprove changes to IDE systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall  terminate a user session automatically after any of the defined conditions occur.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall track and manage configuration changes across integrated tools and environments throughout the systems development life cycle.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall capture the execution of privileged functions in audit logs.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall check media containing diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before the media is used in systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall prevent installation of software by users
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem customers shall control access to media containing CUI.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall correct system flaws within the specified time frame.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define authorizations for controlling the flow of CUI.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall document incidents.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enforce minimum password change of character requirements when new passwords are created.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall  enforce minimum password complexity requirements when new passwords are created.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem's shall logically restrict access so that only authorized personnel can manage configurations.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define essential programs.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define the external system boundary.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall document connections to external systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall control/limit the connections to external systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify the use of external systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall employ FIPS-validated cryptography when used to protect the confidentiality of CUI.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify unauthorized use of organizational systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall conceal previously visible information via a pattern hiding display after 20 minutes of inactivity.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall limit access to CUI on system media to authorized users.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall notify identified authorities of incidents.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall perform malicious code scans with the defined frequency.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall protect the confidentiality of CUI.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify software development techniques that promote effective information security.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall establish separate accounts for individuals whose duties and accesses must be separated.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall correlate  audit record  analysis and reporting processes.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define types of audit logging process failures for which alerts will be generated.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify personnel or roles to be alerted in the event of an audit logging process failure.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall specify the audit logs needed to enable the monitoring, analysis, investigation, and reporting of unlawful or unauthorized system activities.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define methods and enforcement mechanisms for controlling the flow of CUI.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall describe and document the system boundary.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall describe and document the relationship with or connection to the other systems in the system security plan.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall describe and document the system environment of operation.
The Integrated Digital Ecosystem shall employ identified software development techniques that promote effective information security.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall employ an architectural design that promotes effective information security.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall enforce security configuration settings for information technology products employed in the system.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define essential system capabilities based on the principle of least functionality.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall restrict the use of nonessential programs, functions, ports, protocols, and services.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify deficiencies and vulnerabilities to be addressed by a plan of action.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify processes acting on behalf of authorized users.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall limit unsuccessful login attempts.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define a period of inactivity after which an identifier is disabled.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall use multifactor authentication for local and network access to privileged accounts and for network access to non-privileged accounts.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall prevent unauthorized and unintended information transfer via shared system resources.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall specify the number of generations when reuse of passwords is prohibited.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall protect communications at key internal boundaries.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify privileged accounts.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify security functions.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify authorized users.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall define logical access restrictions associated with changes to the system.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify system management functionality.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall Monitor system security alerts and advisories and take action in response.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall protect the authenticity of communications sessions.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify publicly accessible system components.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall perform real-time malicious code scans of files from external sources as files are downloaded, opened, or executed.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall identify architectural designs that promote effective information security.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall assess security controls with the defined frequency to determine if the controls are effective in their application.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall analyze whether changes will impact security prior to implementing the changes.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall assign information security-related issues to designated personnel roles.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall separate user functionality from system management functionality.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall Perform maintenance on IDE systems.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall terminate system access and credentials consistent with personnel actions such as termination or transfer according to a predefined process.
The Integrated Digital Engineering Ecosystem shall require users to use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing non security functions.
